game.name: Delver's Dawn
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Explore a new cryptic and dangerous world every month. Uncover secret paths, find useful equipment and let the rest of the community know about your findings.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore a new cryptic and dangerous world every month. Uncover secret paths, find useful equipment and let the rest of the community know about your findings.
